# Introduction

This is a sample analysis of deals per sectors over time.\
Parameterization is done using R & tidyverse. Rendering is done with [Quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/presentations/powerpoint.html) and Knitr.\
Code is an adaptation of a [question](https://github.com/quarto-dev/quarto-cli/discussions/2403) on the quarto-cli repository.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

See [esteveaq.github.io/hello/blog/report](https://esteveaq.github.io/hello/blog) for more information.


::: {.cell}
